metadata.title: CVE-2021-43008 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: Improper Access Control in Adminer versions 1.12.0 to 4.6.2 (fixed in version 4.6.3) allows an attacker to achieve Arbitrary File Read on the remote server by requesting the Adminer to connect to a remote MySQL database.

criterions.comment: adminer package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
